doc.title: In the Studios: 6 MFA Students at Hunter College in New York
doc.plot: A documentary about Six MFA students working in their studios for two or three hours. Generally people have few chances to visit artists' studios and to see what they are doing and how they creating art and what are happening in the studios. What we can see in museums or galleries are already finished ones. But each artwork is the result of each artist's creation, progress and effort. Through showing and comparing 6 students working in their studios for the same period of time parallel, this documentary reveals the differences and the similarities between art students, their approaches and the atmosphere of their studios.
